activities:
We are a global human capital service provider who supports clients with high-touch solutions in people development, employee mobility and career transition that improve individual and organizational performance. 

Relocating - whether to a new city or a new country - can stir a range of conflicting emotions with an employee and his/her family. Excitement over new opportunities can be tempered by fear of the unknown. Global Mobility Support identifies and addresses relocation issues that can affect the employee’s work performance, including family issues or concerns, and ensures a smooth, successful transition for your key talent.


Holistically supporting your workforce during their departure from your organization.  Support your exiting employees with the necessary tools to help them move forward in their careers or retire with purpose. Providing Career Transition Support is not just "the right thing to do" but demonstrates your commitment to helping your people - which is simply a good business decision.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: We will collecting and processing client, customer, and visitor by automatic means and will also cover manually processed data that we receive directly from the client.
